constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 99 (Tuesday, June 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PALLONE:
H.R. 3789.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Pursuant to clause 3(d)(1) of rule XIII of the Rules of the
House of Representatives, the Committee finds the authority
for this legislation in article 1, section 8 of the
Constitution.
[Page H2702]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: Native Act to Transform Imagery in Various Environments
